info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:24PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Luna County through 500 PM MDT... At 424 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carzalia Valley, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carzalia Valley, Hermanas and Camp Ramsey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
